sentences.chinese: 教育部长寻求更多的部门预算是对的。

detailed_translations.english: Departmental is used to describe the activities, responsibilities, or possessions of a department in a government, company, or other organization

name: headquarter
trans: n. 总部

sentences.english: The NMSP is currently holding a one-month meeting at its headquarter with its army leaders and others.
sentences.chinese: 新孟邦党目前正在其总部同其军队领导人和其他一些人召开一个为期一个月的会议

detailed_translations.english: to place in or establish as headquarters

name: joint venture
trans: 合资企业

name: premise
trans: n. [pl.]经营场址

sentences.english: Schools may earn extra money by renting out their premises.
sentences.chinese: 学校通过出租房屋场地可以获取额外收入。

sentences.english: business premises
sentences.chinese: 企业经营场所

detailed_translations.chinese: 房屋和地基， 经营场址； 前提， 假设
detailed_translations.english: the buildings and land that a shop, restaurant, company etc uses

name: state-owned enterprise
trans: 国有企业

name: reasoning
trans: n. 推理，推论【记忆】词根记忆：reason（推理）+ing（行为）→推理【搭配】inductive reasoning 归纳推理

sentences.english: Let me explain my reasoning.
sentences.chinese: 让我解释我的推论。

sentences.english: Your reasoning is comprehensive but I do not agree with you.
sentences.chinese: 你的推理是可以理解的，但我不同意你的观点。

sentences.english: But auctions require "if he thinks that she thinks that I think that he thinks" chains of reasoning that tend to have weak links.
sentences.chinese: 不过，拍卖要求有“如果他认为她认为我认为他那么认为”的推理链条，而这种链条往往存在薄弱环节。

detailed_translations.english: a process of thinking carefully about something in order to make a judgment

name: replenish
trans: v. 再斟（装）满；添加；加强；补充（钱袋等）【记忆】词根记忆：re（重新）+plen（满）+ish（做）→添加；补充

sentences.english: More vaccines are needed to replenish our stocks.
sentences.chinese: 还需要更多的疫苗来补充我们的储备。

detailed_translations.chinese: 补充，再装满；把…装满；给…添加燃料
detailed_translations.english: to put new supplies into something, or to fill something again

name: ice sheet
trans: 冰盖，冰原

name: latitude
trans: n. 纬度；[pl.]纬度地区；（言行、行动等的）自由【记忆】联想记忆：和attitude（n. 态度）一起记【同义】freedom n. 自由，自主liberty n. 自由，自由权

sentences.english: The birds breed in northern latitudes.
sentences.chinese: 这些鸟在北纬地区繁殖。

detailed_translations.english: The latitude of a place is its distance from the equator.

name: reflect
trans: v. 反映；反省；反射；深思【记忆】词根记忆：re（向后）+flect（弯曲）→（光线）向回弯曲→反射【同根】reflection n. 反映；考虑

sentences.english: The drop in consumer spending reflects concern about the economy.
sentences.chinese: 消费支出的下降反映出人们对经济的担忧。

detailed_translations.english: if a person or a thing is reflected in a mirror, glass, or water, you can see an image of the person or thing on the surface of the mirror, glass, or water

name: space
trans: n. 太空【搭配】space station太空站

sentences.english: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.chinese: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.english: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.chinese: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used

name: reduce
trans: v. 减少，缩小；简化【同义】decrease v./n. 减少，减小

sentences.english: The governor announced a new plan to reduce crime.
sentences.chinese: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.english: The helmet law should reduce injuries in motorcycle accidents.
sentences.chinese: 头盔法的实施应该能减少摩托车事故的受伤率。

sentences.english: Small businesses will need to reduce costs in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 小企业要想生存必须削减成本。

detailed_translations.english: to make something smaller or less in size, amount, or price

name: warming
trans: n. 变暖，升温

name: ocean
trans: n. 海洋；…洋【搭配】the Pacific Ocean太平洋

sentences.english: She stood on the beach, gazing at the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 她站在海滩上，凝视着大海。

sentences.english: I like to swim in the ocean when it’s warm enough.
sentences.chinese: 海水足够暖的时候，我喜欢在海里游泳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洋， 海洋； 许多， 大量
detailed_translations.english: the great mass of salt water that covers most of the Earth’s surface

name: atmosphere
trans: n. 大气；气氛；环境【记忆】词根记忆：atmo（空气）+spher（球体）+ e →围绕地球的空气→大气【搭配】atmosphere of... …的氛围【同根】atmospheric adj. 大气的

sentences.english: The hotel had a lovely relaxed atmosphere .
sentences.chinese: 那家宾馆的气氛轻松愉快。

sentences.english: The atmosphere at home was rather tense.
sentences.chinese: 家里的气氛很紧张。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that an event or place gives you

name: constrict
trans: v. 压缩，使收缩【记忆】词根记忆：con（加强）+strict（拉紧）→拉到一起→压缩

sentences.english: Caffeine constricts the blood vessels in your body.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡因会使体内的血管收缩。

sentences.english: Linda’s throat constricted and she started to cry.
sentences.chinese: 琳达喉咙发紧，哭了起来。

detailed_translations.english: to make something narrower or tighter, or to become narrower or tighter

name: contract
trans:
n. 合同；/kənˈtrækt/
 v. 缩小；签约【同义】pact n. 条约treaty n. 条约，协议

sentences.english: Employees who refuse to relocate are in breach of contract (= have done something not allowed by their contracts ) .
sentences.chinese: 员工拒绝调动岗位是违反合约的。

detailed_translations.english: an official agreement between two or more people, stating what each will do

name: deduct
trans: vt. 扣除，减去【搭配】deduct from 扣除

sentences.english: The company deducted this payment from his compensation.
sentences.chinese: 公司从他的补偿金中扣除了这笔款项。

detailed_translations.english: to take away an amount or part from a total

name: deductible
trans: adj. 可扣除的；可减免的【记忆】词根记忆：deduct（扣除）+ible（可…的） →可扣除的

sentences.english: Part of the auto-loan interest is deductible as a business expense.
sentences.chinese: 作为一项业务支出，汽车消费的部分贷款利息是可以扣除的。

sentences.english: ...deductible expenses.
sentences.chinese: ... 可扣除费用。

sentences.english: Each time they go to a hospital, they have to pay a deductible of $628.
sentences.chinese: 每次他们去医院，他们必须缴纳免赔费用628美元。

detailed_translations.english: If a payment or expense is deductible, it can be deducted from another sum such as your income, for example, when calculating how much income tax you have to pay

detailed_translations.chinese: 免赔率； 免赔额； 扣除额
detailed_translations.english: A deductible is a sum of money which an insured person has to pay toward the cost of an insurance claim. The insurance company pays the rest.

name: deflate
trans: vt. 放气；使缩小【记忆】词根记忆：de（去掉）+flat（吹）+e→吹掉气→放气→使缩小

sentences.english: She was deflated when Fen made no comment on her achievement.
sentences.chinese: 芬对她的成就没作任何评论，她很泄气。

detailed_translations.chinese: 放气；使缩小；紧缩通货；打击；使泄气
detailed_translations.english: if a tyre,  balloon  etc deflates, or if you deflate it, it gets smaller because the gas inside it comes out

name: detract
trans: v. 去掉，减损【记忆】词根记忆：de（向下）+tract（拉）→向下拉→去掉，减损

sentences.english: They feared that the publicity surrounding him would detract from their own election campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 他们担心围绕他的宣传会有损他们自已的竞选活动。

detailed_translations.english: If one thing detracts from another, it makes it seem less good or impressive

name: dwindle
trans: v. 变小，缩小【记忆】联想记忆：d+wind（风）+le→随风而去，越来越小→缩小

sentences.english: The elephant population is dwindling.
sentences.chinese: 大象的数量在减少。

sentences.english: His money had dwindled away.
sentences.chinese: 他的钱在逐渐变少。

detailed_translations.english: to gradually become less and less or smaller and smaller

name: indent
trans: n. 订货单；v. 将（行首）缩格

detailed_translations.english: an official order for goods or equipment

name: lessen
trans: vt. 减少，减轻【记忆】词根记忆：less（少）+en（使…）→减少

sentences.english: Gradually her anxiety lessened.
sentences.chinese: 她的焦虑慢慢减轻了。

detailed_translations.english: to become smaller in size, importance, or value, or make something do this

name: narrow
trans: adj. 狭窄的；v. 变窄【参考】narrow-minded adj. 心胸狭窄的

sentences.english: The stairs were very narrow.
sentences.chinese: 楼梯非常狭窄。

sentences.english: a long, narrow band of cloud
sentences.chinese: 窄长的云带

detailed_translations.english: measuring only a small distance from one side to the other, especially in relation to the length

name: restriction
trans: n. 限制，约束【搭配】speed restriction 速度限制impose restriction on... 对…进行限制

sentences.english: a 50 mph speed restriction
sentences.chinese: 每小时50英里的限速

detailed_translations.english: a rule or law that limits or controls what people can do

name: shrink
trans: v. （使）收缩；萎缩【记忆】联想记忆：童话里喝（drink）了药水就能将身体收缩（shrink）

sentences.english: I’m worried about washing that shirt in case it shrinks.
sentences.chinese: 我不太敢洗那件衬衫，怕它会缩水。

detailed_translations.chinese: 起皱； 收缩； 退缩， 畏缩
detailed_translations.english: to become smaller, or to make something smaller, through the effects of heat or water

name: subtract
trans: vt. 减去；去掉【记忆】词根记忆：sub（在下面）+tract（拉）→拉下来→减去

sentences.english: Then the deal is that when you sell the house they subtract -you've got to pay this.
sentences.chinese: 那么当你售出房子后，他们会从中减去，这个余额，这就是你要付给他们的。

sentences.english: That is, if you find that a sensor consistently overestimates by a certain value, you can subtract that value before the final value is reported.
sentences.chinese: 也就是说，如果您发现某个传感器总是偏高于某个特定数值，那么就可以减去该数值后再报告最终的数值。

sentences.english: Thus, if you have staff activities in loops and want to run the above request, you need to ensure that you subtract only events which belong together.
sentences.chinese: 因此，如果您在循环中具有人员活动，并且想要运行以上的请求，那么您必须确保您只减去了属于一起的事件。

detailed_translations.english: to take a number or an amount from a larger number or amount

name: subtraction
trans: n. 减法，减去【记忆】词根记忆：subtract（减去）+ion（行为）→减去

sentences.english: In other words, we can use the magic of subtraction.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，我们可以借助减法的魔力。

sentences.english: It also lets you perform mathematical operations like addition, subtraction, division, and multiplication on two statistics.
sentences.chinese: 它还允许您对两个统计数据执行诸如加、减、乘、除等数学运算。

sentences.english: Atomicity enables the two operations -- the subtraction from the savings account and the addition to the checking account -- to be treated as a single transaction.
sentences.chinese: 原子性使得这两个操作 —— 从储蓄帐户减钱和向支票帐户加钱 —— 被当作单个事务进行处理。

detailed_translations.english: the process of taking a number or amount from a larger number or amount

name: anticipated effect
trans: 预期效应

name: combustion
trans: n. 燃烧；燃烧过程【同根】combustibility n. 燃烧性，可燃性

sentences.english: The energy is released by combustion on the application of a match.
sentences.chinese: 能量通过点火柴燃烧释放出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process of burning

name: Copenhagen Accord
trans: 《哥本哈根协议》

name: energy consumption
trans: 能源消耗

name: exhaust gas
trans: 废气

name: expansion of desert
trans: 沙漠扩张

name: extreme weather
trans: 极端天气

name: give off
trans: 排放【搭配】give off heat发热

sentences.english: ...natural gas, which gives off less carbon dioxide than coal.
sentences.chinese: …天然气的二氧化碳排放量少于煤。

detailed_translations.english: If something gives off or gives out a gas, heat, or a smell, it produces it and sends it out into the air

name: glacier
trans: n. 冰川，冰河【记忆】词根记忆：glac（冰）+ier（表物）→冰川，冰河

sentences.english: The glacier calved a large iceberg.
sentences.chinese: 冰川崩解而产生一个大冰山。

sentences.english: The glacier dislocated great stones.
sentences.chinese: 冰川使许多大石块移位了。

sentences.english: A river or glacier debouches on the plains.
sentences.chinese: 一条河流或冰川流向平原。

detailed_translations.english: a large mass of ice which moves slowly down a mountain valley

name: global warming
trans: 全球变暖

name: greenhouse effect
trans: 温室效应

sentences.english: It's because of the greenhouse effect, and these islands belong to Maldives.
sentences.chinese: 因为温室效应呗，这些岛屿是属于马尔代夫的。

sentences.english: The star actor was NASA Godard Institute for Space Studies director James Hansen who claimed with 99 percent certainty that temperatures were rising due to a human-influenced "greenhouse effect".
sentences.chinese: 明星演员是美国宇航局戈达尔太空研究所所长詹姆斯·汉森，他声称有99%的把握，由于人类活动影响的“温室效应”，气温正在上升。

sentences.english: Other schemes entail the placement of giant orbiting mirrors to focus sunlight upon Mars’ polar icecaps, thus releasing liquid water and gaseous carbon dioxide to kick-start a greenhouse effect.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还要在火星轨道放置巨型反光镜，集中太阳光融化火星极地的冰盖，从而释放出液态的水和气态的二氧化碳制造温室效应。

detailed_translations.english: the gradual warming of the air surrounding the Earth as a result of heat being trapped by  pollution

name: greenhouse gas
trans: 温室气体

name: heat wave
trans: 热浪

name: heating
trans: n. 加热；供热系统【搭配】heating installation 供暖装置

sentences.english: We wanted to reduce the cost of heating and air-conditioning.
sentences.chinese: 我们想减少供暖与空调的开支。

detailed_translations.english: the process of heating a building or room, considered especially from the point of view of how much this costs

name: human activity
trans: 人类活动

name: Kyoto Protocol
trans: 京都议定书

name: melt
trans: v. 融化【搭配】melt away 融掉

sentences.english: It was warmer now, and the snow was beginning to melt.
sentences.chinese: 现在天气暖和了，雪开始融化。

sentences.english: Melt the butter in a saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 把黄油放在深平底锅里化开。

detailed_translations.english: if something solid melts or if heat melts it, it becomes liquid

name: potential problems
trans: 潜在问题

name: precipitation
trans: n. 降雨量，降水（量）【搭配】precipitation change 降水变化

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 沉淀，[化学] 沉淀物；降水；冰雹；坠落；鲁莽
detailed_translations.english: rain, snow etc that falls on the ground, or the amount of rain, snow etc that falls

name: reduce emission
trans: 减排

name: rising sea level
trans: 海平面上升

name: temperature increase
trans: 温度升高

name: the warming of global temperature
trans: 全球气温变暖

name: Antarctica
trans: n. 南极洲

name: Arctic
trans: adj. 北极的

sentences.english: the Arctic island of Novaya Zemlya
sentences.chinese: 北极的新地岛

sentences.english: ...winter in the Arctic.
sentences.chinese: …北极的冬天。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the most northern part of the world
The Arctic is the area of the world around the North Pole. It is extremely cold and there is very little light in winter and very little darkness in summer.

name: equator
trans: n. （地球）赤道

sentences.english: The United States is north of the equator.
sentences.chinese: 美国位于赤道以北。

sentences.english: In the hot zone near the equator the sun heats the air continually; hence the air there ascends.
sentences.chinese: 在靠近赤道的热带地区，太阳不断地加热那里的空气，于是那里的热空气就上升。

detailed_translations.english: an imaginary line drawn around the middle of the Earth that is exactly the same distance from the North Pole and the South Pole

name: hemisphere
trans: n. （地球的）半球；大脑半球【搭配】the Northern Hemisphere 北半球

sentences.english: the Northern hemisphere
sentences.chinese: 北半球

detailed_translations.english: a half of the Earth, especially one of the halves above and below the equator

name: longitude
trans: n. 经度

sentences.english: The town lies at longitude 12˚ east.
sentences.chinese: 这个镇位于东经12度。

detailed_translations.english: the distance east or west of a particular  meridian (= imaginary line along the Earth’s surface from the North Pole to the South Pole )  , measured in degrees

name: meridian
trans: n. 子午线

sentences.english: Yes this is the…is the prime meridian if you like.
sentences.chinese: 是的，这就是本初子午线，它把地球分为东半球和西半球。

sentences.english: The prime meridian of longitude is in greenwich south london.
sentences.chinese: 经度的本初子午线在伦敦南部的格林威治。

detailed_translations.english: one of the imaginary lines from the North Pole to the South Pole, drawn on a map of the Earth

name: temperate zone
trans: 温带

name: the Antarctic
trans: 南极地区

sentences.english: Icebergs in the Antarctic area sometimes have stripes, formed by layers of snow that react to different conditions.
sentences.chinese: 南极地区的冰山有时便会有条纹，由于雪层对不同环境的反应从而形成了这些条纹。

sentences.english: Krill, the whales’ main source of food, are threatened by higher ocean temperatures and melting sea ice around the Antarctic, which would in turn hurt the whales’ chances of survival.
sentences.chinese: 在南极地区，由于海洋温度的上升和海冰的融化，露脊鲸主要的食物来源南极磷虾受到了严重威胁，这反过来也危及到了鲸类的生存。

sentences.english: "For whatever reason, they were still hanging out on the Antarctic continent," Case said in a statement.
sentences.chinese: “无论是什么原因，它们确实一直在南极大陆上生活，”凯斯在一份声明中说。

name: tropic
trans: n. 热带

sentences.english: The tropic sun glared down on us all day.
sentences.chinese: 热带的太阳整日灼晒着我们。

sentences.english: There was a restaurant a little way off Broadway where one could be served almost al fresco in a tropic array of screening flora.
sentences.chinese: 离百老汇不远有一家餐馆，在那里用餐几乎像是置身于户外一排热带遮护植物中一样。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two imaginary lines around the world, either the Tropic of Cancer which is 23.5˚ north of the  equator  , or the Tropic of Capricorn which is 23.5˚ south of the equator

name: theory
trans: n. 理论，原理；学说；意见，看法【记忆】词根记忆：theo（神）+ry→从理论上讲，神是不存在的【同根】theorize v. 理论化，学说化theoretical adj. 理论（上）的

sentences.english: Freudian theory has had a great influence on psychology.
sentences.chinese: 弗洛伊德理论对心理学产生过巨大影响。

detailed_translations.english: an idea or set of ideas that is intended to explain something about life or the world, especially an idea that has not yet been proved to be true

name: relate
trans: v. 有关联；适应，和睦相处；讲述，叙述【记忆】联想记忆：re+late（新近的）→和新近的事件有关联→有关联【同根】relative adj. 有关系的；相对的；n. 亲属relation n. 关系；故事

sentences.english: The report seeks to relate the rise in crime to an increase in unemployment.
sentences.chinese: 报告试图把犯罪率上升和失业增加联系起来。

sentences.english: He later related the whole story to me.
sentences.chinese: 他后来给我讲了整件事的来龙去脉。

detailed_translations.english: if you relate two different things, you show how they are connected

name: distinguish
trans: vt. 区别，辨别；辨认出；使杰出【记忆】词根记忆：di(s)（分离）+stingu（刺）+ ish→将刺挑出来→区别，辨别【搭配】distinguish between 辨别，弄清distinguish...from... 把…与…区别开distinguish oneself 使自己杰出【同义】discern v. 洞悉，辨别differentiate v. 区分

sentences.english: The factor that distinguishes this company from the competition is customer service.
sentences.chinese: 使这家公司在竞争中脱颖而出的是其客户服务。

sentences.english: A further escalation of the crisis now seems inevitable.
sentences.chinese: 危机的进一步升级现在看来已不可避免。

trans: n. 分支机构

sentences.chinese: 他想成为一家美国公司的会员，因为他需要法律事务方面的专家意见。

a company, organization etc that is connected with or controlled by a larger one

name: affinity
trans: n. 密切的关系；类同

sentences.english: He has a close affinity with the landscape and people he knew when he was growing up.
sentences.chinese: 他对他成长过程中所熟悉的景色和人们有一种很强的亲切感。

name: association
trans: n. 协会，团体；联合，联系，交往；联想【搭配】research associations 研究协会an alumni association 校友会【同义】union n. 联合

sentences.english: Scotland has all kinds of happy associations for me.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰给我各种各样愉快的联想。

sentences.chinese: 我父亲把他所有的钱都投在上市债券上。

sentences.english: the emotional bond between mother and child

trans: adj. 亲近的；亲密的

sentences.chinese: 她拉上了窗帘。

sentences.english: Let me do the car door – it won’t close properly.
sentences.chinese: 我来修一下车门，它关不紧。

sentences.chinese: 贝丝合上眼睛想睡觉。

sentences.english: She heard the door close behind her.
sentences.chinese: 她听见门在她身后关上了。

name: closeness
trans: n. 接近

trans: v. 合作；勾结，通敌【搭配】collaborate with...on... 与…合作…【同根】collaboration n. 合作collaborative adj. 合作的

sentences.english: Much later he collaborated with his son Michael on the English translation of a text on food production.
sentences.chinese: 后来他和儿子迈克尔合作，把一个有关食品生产的文本翻译成英语。

name: complement
trans:
v. 补足，补充；与…相辅相成；/ˈkɒmplɪmənt/
 n. 补足物，补充【记忆】词根记忆：com（加强）+ple（满的）+ ment →都填满了→补足

trans: adj. 联合的；同心协力的【搭配】concerted action 一致行动

trans: adj. 意气相投的，情趣相投的；合得来的【记忆】词根记忆：con（共同）+gen（产生）+ ial（…的）→产生共同点的→意气相投的

trans: n. 共识；（意见）一致【记忆】词根记忆：con（共同）+sens（感觉）+ us→感觉相同→一致【搭配】value consensus 价值共识【同义】unanimity n. 全体一致

sentences.chinese: 欧盟财政部长会议未能就一体化的进度达成共识。

if two or more facts, ideas etc correlate or if you correlate them, they are closely connected to each other or one causes the other

sentences.chinese: …这个城市对旅游业的传统依赖。

trans: adj. 依赖的；取决于…的

sentences.chinese: 简的母亲要靠简来照顾。

trans: n. 派生物；衍生物；adj. 模仿他人的；缺乏创意的

detailed_translations.english: something that has developed or been produced from something else

trans: vt. 取代；使离开原位【记忆】词根记忆：dis（除去，剥夺）+place（位置） →使从位置上离开→使离开原位

trans: n. （不同特质、思想等的）合成体，融合体；合为一体；融合

sentences.english: the best fusion cuisine in the whole of Vancouver

name: intimate
trans: adj. 亲密的；个人的；小圈子内的；vt. 暗示；n. 至交，密友【搭配】be intimate with sb. 与某人保持亲密关系intimate details 隐私intimate knowledge of... 对…非常了解，熟悉on intimate terms with sb. 与某人保持亲密关系

sentences.english: an intimate friend of Picasso’s

sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢德夫，他好像也不喜欢我。

trans: n. 关系

sentences.english: a close/near/distant relation of mine
sentences.chinese: 我的一位近亲 / 远亲

trans: adj. 分别的，各自的，各个的

name: subsidiary
trans: adj. 次要的；辅助的，附设的；n. 子公司；附属机构；支流【记忆】词根记忆：sub（在下面）+sidi（=sid坐）+ ary（…的）→坐在下面的→次要的，辅助的【搭配】subsidiary unit 从属单位a subsidiary company 分公司

sentences.english: a subsidiary hypothesis

detailed_translations.english: connected with, but less important than, something else

sentences.chinese: 德国队在比赛半场时换上一名替补队员。

sentences.english: substitute goalkeeper

sentences.chinese: 你可不要听了他的许诺就改变主意呀。

sentences.chinese: 我的童年很快乐。

name: bound up with
trans: 密切相关

name: system
trans: n. 系统，体系；体制【搭配】digestive system 消化系统【同根】systematic adj. 系统的

sentences.english: an alarm system
sentences.chinese: 警报系统

sentences.english: a well-designed heating system
sentences.chinese: 设计良好的供暖系统

sentences.english: the digestive system
sentences.chinese: 消化系统

sentences.english: the railway system
sentences.chinese: 铁路系统

detailed_translations.chinese: 系统； 制度， 体制； 方法， 做法； 身体

name: numeration
trans: n. 计算

sentences.chinese: 然而，对于很大的数， 这种编号制度的效率很低。

sentences.chinese: 早期算数和计算法的发展痕迹可以很容易就找到。

sentences.english: Then based on the IGGⅢ?scheme which is suitable for numeration in the surveying field, the paper constructs equivalent weight function by studentized residual for robust estimation.
sentences.chinese: 首先分析了现有几种等价权函数的优缺点，然后以适合于测量领域计算的IGGⅢ方案为基础，利用服从于t分布的学生化残差构造等价权函数来进行抗差估计。

name: imagination
trans: n. 想象【记忆】来自imagine（v. 想象）

sentences.english: a storyteller with an incredible imagination
sentences.chinese: 想象力极丰富的讲故事者

sentences.english: It does not take much imagination to understand their grief.
sentences.chinese: 不难想象他们是多么悲伤。

sentences.english: With a little imagination, you can find great inexpensive gifts.
sentences.chinese: 稍微动点脑筋，你就会找到物美价廉的礼物。

sentences.english: These people do exist; they’re not figments of my imagination.
sentences.chinese: 这些人确实存在，他们不是我凭空想象出来的。

trans: v. 考虑；认为【同根】consideration n. 考虑

sentences.chinese: 我们得仔细考虑你的提议。

sentences.english: The local authority considered that the school did not meet requirements.
sentences.chinese: 当地政府认为这所学校达不到要求。

name: problem

sentences.english: She was older than me, but that wasn’t really a problem.
sentences.chinese: 她比我年长，不过那不算什么问题。

sentences.english: She gave us 20 mathematical problems to solve.
sentences.chinese: 她让我们解20道数学题。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that causes difficulties

name: facility

sentences.chinese: 什么娱乐设施现在是可用的？

name: childhood memories

name: childhood dream
trans: 童年梦想

name: naive
trans: adj. 幼稚的，天真的，不成熟的【记忆】联想记忆：native（原始的，土著的）去掉t→比土著人还要少一点阅历→天真的，幼稚的

sentences.chinese: 天真的小女孩

sentences.english: Jim can be so naive sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆有时候非常幼稚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 幼稚的； 天真的； 轻信的

name: childish
trans: adj. 幼稚的，不成熟的

sentences.english: a high childish laugh
sentences.chinese: 孩子气的高声大笑

sentences.english: her childish excitement
sentences.chinese: 她孩子般的激动

sentences.english: I wish politicians would stop this childish name-calling.
sentences.chinese: 我希望政客们能停止这种幼稚的谩骂。

detailed_translations.english: relating to or typical of a child

name: puerile
trans: adj. 幼稚的，孩子气的

sentences.english: a puerile joke
sentences.chinese: 幼稚的玩笑

detailed_translations.chinese: 幼稚的；孩子气的；未成熟的；天真的
detailed_translations.english: silly and stupid

name: juvenile
trans: adj. 少年的；幼稚的；n. 未成年人，少年【记忆】词根记忆：juven（年轻）+ile（属于…的）→少年的；幼稚的

sentences.english: juvenile crime
sentences.chinese: 少年犯罪

sentences.english: a juvenile court
sentences.chinese: 少年法院[法庭]

sentences.english: The number of juveniles in the general population has fallen by a fifth in the past 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的10年中，青少年在总人口中所占的比重下降了1/5。

detailed_translations.chinese: 少年的，少年特有的；幼稚的，不成熟的
detailed_translations.english: law relating to young people who are not yet adults
A juvenile is a child or young person who is not yet old enough to be regarded as an adult

name: innocent
trans: adj. 天真的；清白的【记忆】词根记忆：in（不）+noc（伤害）+ent（…的） →单纯无害人之心的→天真的

sentences.english: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 没人肯相信我是清白的。

sentences.english: The court found him innocent and he was released.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判他无罪，他被释放了。

sentences.english: She had always regarded Greg as a hopeless innocent where women were concerned.
sentences.chinese: 她过去一直认为格雷格在关于女人方面是一个不可救药的无知者。

detailed_translations.english: not guilty of a crime
An innocent is someone who is innocent

name: conceive
trans: v. 想象；构想，构思；怀孕【同根】conceivable adj. 可想象的

sentences.english: He conceived the idea of transforming the old power station into an arts centre.
sentences.chinese: 他想出了一个把旧发电站改造为艺术中心的主意。

sentences.english: God is often conceived of as male.
sentences.chinese: 上帝常常被想象为男性。

sentences.english: She is unable to conceive.
sentences.chinese: 她不能怀孕。

sentences.english: Their first child was conceived on their wedding night.
sentences.chinese: 他们的第一个小孩是在新婚之夜怀上的。

detailed_translations.english: to form an idea, a plan, etc. in your mind; to imagine sth

name: envisage
trans: v. 展望，想象；面对【搭配】envisage realism 正视现实

sentences.english: The scheme cost a lot more than we had originally envisaged.
sentences.chinese: 该计划的花费大大超出了我们最初所预想的数额。

detailed_translations.english: to think that something is likely to happen in the future

name: envision
trans: v. 想象，展望

sentences.english: I envisioned a future of educational excellence.
sentences.chinese: 我展望了一个有着优质教育的未来。

detailed_translations.english: to imagine something that you think might happen in the future, especially something that you think will be good

name: fancy
trans: n. 设想；爱好；vt. 想象；adj. 别致的

sentences.english: Harry took me to a fancy restaurant for our anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 哈里带我去了一家豪华餐厅，庆祝我们的结婚纪念日。

detailed_translations.english: fancy hotels, restaurants, cars etc are expensive and fashionable
an idea or opinion that is not based on fact
to like or want something, or want to do something

name: imagine
trans: vt. 想象；猜想【同根】imaginary adj. 想象的，假想的imaginative adj. 富有想象力的

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

name: unimaginable
trans: adj. 不可思议的，不可想象的

sentences.english: unimaginable wealth
sentences.chinese: 难以想象的财富

detailed_translations.chinese: 不能想象的, 想象不到的
detailed_translations.english: not possible to imagine

name: visualize
trans: v. 使具体化；想象，设想【记忆】词根记忆：vis（看）+ual+ize（…化）→使 （大家）看到→使具体化

sentences.english: I tried to visualize the house while he was describing it.
sentences.chinese: 我一边听他描述，一边想象那房子的样子。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture of someone or something in your mind

name: apt
trans: adj. 易于…的；适宜的；敏捷的【记忆】本身为词根：适应，能力

sentences.english: ‘Love at first sight’ is a very apt description of how he felt when he saw her.
sentences.chinese: 用“一见钟情”来形容他见到她时的感觉再恰当不过。

sentences.english: She had taught him French and he had been an apt student.
sentences.chinese: 她教过他法语，他一直是个聪慧的学生。

detailed_translations.english: exactly right for a particular situation or purpose

name: aptitude
trans: n. 适宜；才能【记忆】联想记忆：感激（gratitude）上苍让你具备这种才能（aptitude）

sentences.english: He drifted into publishing and discovered an aptitude for working with accounts.
sentences.chinese: 他偶入出版界，发现自己具有管账的天资。

detailed_translations.english: natural ability or skill, especially in learning

name: attainment
trans: n. 素养【同根】attain vt. 达到；获得

sentences.english: a low level of educational attainment
sentences.chinese: 教育程度低

detailed_translations.english: success in achieving something or reaching a particular level

name: calibre
trans: n. 才干，能力；口径

sentences.english: The school attracts a high calibre of student.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校吸引高素质的学生。

detailed_translations.english: the level of quality or ability that someone or something has achieved

name: capacity
trans: n. 容量；能力；接受力；宽敞；身份【记忆】词根记忆：cap（拿）+acity（表状态、情况）→能拿住→容量

sentences.english: The room had seating capacity for about 80.
sentences.chinese: 这房间能坐80个人左右。

sentences.english: The orchestra played to a capacity crowd (= the largest number of people who can fit into a hall, theatre etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 管弦乐队为满场的观众演奏。

sentences.english: All the hotels were filled to capacity.
sentences.chinese: 所有的宾馆都住满了。

sentences.english: a child’s capacity for learning
sentences.chinese: 孩子的学习能力

detailed_translations.english: the amount of space a container, room etc has to hold things or people

name: competent
trans: adj. 有能力的；能胜任的【记忆】词根记忆：com（加强）+pet（力争）+ ent（…的）→（敢于）竞争的→有能力【反义】inefficient adj. （指人）不能胜任的

sentences.english: A competent mechanic should be able to fix the problem.
sentences.chinese: 一名合格的机修工应该能够解决这个问题。

detailed_translations.english: having enough skill or knowledge to do something to a satisfactory standard

name: creativity
trans: n. 创造力【搭配】creativity and innovation创新

sentences.english: artistic creativity
sentences.chinese: 艺术创造力

sentences.english: Teachers have been attacked for stifling creativity in their pupils.
sentences.chinese: 教师被批评压抑了学生的创造力。

sentences.english: Editors complain about the lack of creativity in the ideas put to them.
sentences.chinese: 编辑们抱怨说交给他们的选题缺乏创意。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to use your imagination to produce new ideas, make things etc

name: disable
trans: v. （使）丧失能力；（使）伤残

sentences.english: She did all this tendon damage and it really disabled her.
sentences.chinese: 她肌腱受了这么多损伤，这真地使她致残了。

detailed_translations.english: If an injury or illness disables someone, it affects them so badly that it restricts the way that they can live their life

name: gift
trans: n. 天赋；礼物

sentences.english: The earrings were a gift from my aunt.
sentences.chinese: 这副耳环是我姑姑送给我的礼物。

sentences.english: The clock was given as a retirement gift when he left the police.
sentences.chinese: 这个钟表是他退休离开警局时收到的礼物。

sentences.english: expensive wedding gifts
sentences.chinese: 昂贵的结婚礼物

sentences.english: Enjoy a free gift with any purchase of $20 or more.
sentences.chinese: 购物满20美元奉送礼品一份。

sentences.english: This excellent cookbook would make an ideal gift for anyone just going away to college.
sentences.chinese: 这本精美的烹饪书送给要离家上大学的人是很好的礼物。

sentences.english: a gift for languages
sentences.chinese: 语言天赋

detailed_translations.english: something that you give someone, for example to thank them or because you like them, especially on a special occasion

name: inborn
trans: adj. 天生的，天赋的【记忆】词根记忆：in（内）+born（出生）→天生的

sentences.english: Mammals have an inborn fear of snakes.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳动物天生害怕蛇。

sentences.english: Good taste is inborn and cannot be learned.
sentences.chinese: 好的鉴赏力是与生俱来的，无法通过后天习得。

detailed_translations.english: an inborn quality or ability is one you have had naturally since birth

name: inherent
trans: adj. 内在的；固有的

sentences.english: Every business has its own inherent risks.
sentences.chinese: 每笔生意本身都有风险。

sentences.english: I’m afraid the problems you mention are inherent in the system.
sentences.chinese: 你提及的这些问题恐怕本来就存在于这个体制中。

detailed_translations.english: a quality that is inherent in something is a natural part of it and cannot be separated from it

name: insightful
trans: adj. 富有洞察力的，有深刻见解的【搭配】insightful learning 顿悟学习

sentences.english: an insightful analysis
sentences.chinese: 有见地的分析

detailed_translations.chinese: 有深刻见解的，富有洞察力的
detailed_translations.english: able to understand, or showing that you understand, what a situation or person is really like

name: intelligence
trans: n. 智力【搭配】intelligence quotient 智商

sentences.english: To be good at the game, you need a reasonable level of intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 要想把这种游戏玩好，需要一定的智力水平。

sentences.english: According to our intelligence, further attacks were planned.
sentences.chinese: 根据我们的情报，还会有更进一步的攻击。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to learn, understand, and think about things

name: mentality
trans: n. 心态；智力【记忆】词根记忆：mental（思想，心智）+ity（名词后缀）→心态

sentences.english: a get-rich-quick mentality
sentences.chinese: 一夜暴富的心态

sentences.english: I can’t understand the mentality of the people who are behind this kind of violence.
sentences.chinese: 我不能理解这种暴力行为的幕后指使者是什么心态。

detailed_translations.english: a particular attitude or way of thinking, especially one that you think is wrong or stupid

name: potency
trans: n. 潜能【同根】potential adj. 有潜力的

sentences.english: The myth of male superiority was losing its potency.
sentences.chinese: 男性优越的错误观念在逐渐失去影响力。

detailed_translations.english: the power that something has to influence people

name: viability
trans: n. 可行性；生存能力

sentences.english: It evaluates the basic viability of the project.
sentences.chinese: 它估计了项目的基本生存能力。

sentences.english: At this first, or highest level of change, you seek to establish the opportunity and agree to the viability of the approach.
sentences.chinese: 在变化的第一层或是最高层，您寻找机会去创建世纪，对方法的生存能力达成一致看法。

name: connect
trans: v. 连接，衔接；联合；关联，联系；给…接通电话【记忆】词根记忆：con+nect（连接）→连接【搭配】connect with/to... 与…连接

sentences.english: We’d like two rooms with connecting doors (= doors that join the rooms ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们想要两个有门相通的房间。

sentences.english: I didn’t connect the two events in my mind.
sentences.chinese: 我心里没把这两件事联系起来。

detailed_translations.english: to join two or more things together

name: connection
trans: n. 联系，关联

sentences.english: Police have so far failed to establish a connection between the two murders.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止警方尚未确定两宗凶杀案之间有关联。

sentences.english: The evidence was there in the file but no one made the connection .
sentences.chinese: 证据就在档案里，但没有人把它们联系起来。

sentences.english: Students often see little connection between school and the rest of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 学生往往看不到上学和今后生活的联系。

sentences.english: He demonstrated the close connection between social conditions and health.
sentences.chinese: 他证明了社会条件和健康之间的密切联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连接； 联系； 连接物， 连接点； 亲戚
detailed_translations.english: the way in which two facts, ideas, events etc are related to each other, and one is affected or caused by the other

name: correlation
trans: n. 相互关系，相关【记忆】词根记忆：cor（共同）+relation（关系）→相互关系

sentences.english: ...the correlation between smoking and disease.
sentences.chinese: …吸烟和疾病之间的关联。

detailed_translations.english: a connection between two ideas, facts etc, especially when one may be the cause of the other

name: relevance
trans: n. 中肯，适当；相关性【记忆】词根记忆：re（一再）+lev（举）+ance →不要一再抬高，要中肯一些→中肯【同义】combine vt. 使结合join vi. 加入，结合

sentences.english: I think we can all appreciate the relevance of that now.
sentences.chinese: 我想，我们大家现在都能领会这句话中肯。

name: relevant
trans: adj. 有关的，相应的；适当的，中肯的；实质性的，有重大意义的【记忆】词根记忆：re（一再）+lev（举）+ant（…的） →不要反复举例子，要相关的论据→相关的【搭配】relevant to 与…相关，有关的，相应的relevant details 相关细节【同根】irrelevant adj. 不相关的；不切题的

sentences.english: Relevant documents were presented in court.
sentences.chinese: 法庭上出示了相关的文件。

sentences.english: We received all the relevant information.
sentences.chinese: 我们收到了所有相关信息。

detailed_translations.english: directly relating to the subject or problem being discussed or considered

name: mathematics
trans: n. 数学【同根】mathematical adj. 数学的

sentences.english: ...a professor of mathematics at Boston College.
sentences.chinese: …一位波士顿大学的数学教授。

detailed_translations.english: the science of numbers and of shapes, including  algebra  ,  geometry  , and  arithmetic

name: chance
trans: n. 机会；机遇【搭配】chance to do sth. 做某事的机会

sentences.english: If someone invited me over to Florida, I’d jump at the chance (= use the opportunity eagerly ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请我去佛罗里达，我会赶紧抓住这个机会。

sentences.english: There’s always the chance that something will go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 总有可能会出现问题。

sentences.english: If we did move to London, I’d stand a much better chance (= have a much better chance ) of getting a job.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们真的搬到伦敦去，我找到工作的机会就大多了。

sentences.english: There is little chance of her being found alive.
sentences.chinese: 她生还的可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: a time or situation which you can use to do something that you want to do

name: appreciate
trans: v. 赏识，鉴赏；感激；增值【记忆】词根记忆：ap（加强）+preci（价值）+ate（做）→对价值给予肯定→赏识【搭配】appreciate doing sth. 对做某事表示感激【同根】appreciation n. 欣赏，感激appreciative adj. 感激的，表示赞赏的appreciable adj. 值得重视的；可觉察到的

sentences.english: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.chinese: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.english: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.english: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

sentences.english: Her abilities are not fully appreciated by her employer.
sentences.chinese: 她的才干没有得到雇主的充分赏识。

sentences.english: I’m not an expert, but I appreciate fine works of art.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：我不是专家，但我欣赏优秀的艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done

name: accuracy
trans: n. 正确度；精确性【同根】accurate adj. 正确无误的；精确的inaccurate adj. 错误的

sentences.english: He passes the ball with unerring accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 他传球准确无误。

sentences.english: They questioned the accuracy of the information in the file.
sentences.chinese: 他们怀疑档案中信息的正确性。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being exact or correct; the ability to do sth skilfully without making mistakes

name: algebra
trans: n. 代数，代数学

sentences.english: On the basis of minimax algebra theory, this paper provides an algebra method of solving countable stages decision problems in the dynamic programming.
sentences.chinese: 本文根据极大极小代数理论，给出了一种用以求解动态规划中有限多阶段决策问题的代数算法。

sentences.english: Through the symbol computer algebra, a fourth order perturbation solution for the one dimentional stable coupled flows of elastic fluids in the deformable porous media.
sentences.chinese: 用计算机代数系统进行符号运算，求得了可变形多孔介质中弹性流体一维定常耦合渗流问题的四阶摄动解。

sentences.english: This paper uses several methods of complex functions theorey to prove fundamental theorem of algebra by argument principle, maximum modulus principle and minimum modulus principle.
sentences.chinese: 从复变函数理论出发，利用辐角原理、最大模原理、最小模原理给出代数学基本定理的几种新的证明方法。

detailed_translations.english: a type of mathematics that uses letters and other signs to represent numbers and values

name: altitude
trans: n. 海拔，高度；[pl.] 高地【记忆】词根记忆：alt（高）+itude（表状态）→海拔，高度

sentences.english: The aircraft had reached its cruising altitude of about 39,000 feet.
sentences.chinese: 那架飞机已经达到了大约三万九千英尺的巡航高度。

detailed_translations.english: the height of an object or place above the sea

name: approximate
trans:
adj. 近似的；/əˈprɒksɪmeɪt/
 vt. 近似【同根】approximately adv. 近似地，大约

sentences.english: For each approximate solution of a parameterized problem, the app also displays the margin of error.
sentences.chinese: 对于每一个参数化问题的近似结果，这个程序也会显示误差的边界。

sentences.english: Until the versions released in 1995, chunks were left unsorted within bins, so that the best-fit strategy was only approximate .
sentences.chinese: 直到1995年发布的半本，块在箱子里还是未排序的，所以最佳适合策略还只是近似的。

sentences.english: The model downloaded to a smart phone finds an approximate solution for a new set of parameters by reference to the precomputed solutions.
sentences.chinese: 这个模型会被下载到智能手机上，通过引用预先计算好的结果来找到一个对应新的参数组的近似结果。

detailed_translations.english: to be close to a particular number
an approximate number, amount, or time is close to the exact number, amount etc, but could be a little bit more or less than it

name: arc
trans: n. 弧

sentences.english: the arc of a rainbow
sentences.chinese: 彩虹的弧状

detailed_translations.english: a curved shape or line

name: arithmetic
trans: n. 算术【记忆】联想记忆：数学（mathematic）包括算术（arithmetic）

sentences.english: He's not very good at arithmetic.
sentences.chinese: 他不太擅长算术。

sentences.english: a quick bit of mental arithmetic
sentences.chinese: 快速心算

detailed_translations.english: the type of mathematics that deals with the adding, multiplying, etc. of numbers

name: ascending
trans: adj. 上升的，向上的【同根】ascend v. 攀登；上升

sentences.english: Now draw or trace ten dinosaurs in ascending order of size.
sentences.chinese: 现在按大小以升序画或描出10只恐龙。

detailed_translations.english: If a group of things is arranged in ascending order, each thing is bigger, greater, or more important than the thing before it

name: assumption
trans: n. 假定【同根】assume v. 假定

sentences.english: You would be making an assumption that's not based on any fact that you could report.
sentences.chinese: 你会做出不以你能报道的任何事实为依据的一种假设。

detailed_translations.english: something that you think is true although you have no definite proof

name: calculus
trans: n. 微积分

sentences.english: We have to factor that into the calculus.
sentences.chinese: 我们要在微积分学中考虑这些因素。

sentences.english: All this leads up to the most fundamental of theorems of calculus .
sentences.chinese: 综上所述就导出了微积分学中的最基本的定理。

sentences.english: Obstruction with stasis also led to the formation of the yellow-brown calculus (stone).
sentences.chinese: 伴有尿液郁积的阻塞还能导致黄褐色的结石（石头）形成。

detailed_translations.english: the part of mathematics that deals with changing quantities, such as the speed of a falling stone or the slope of a curved line

name: complementary
trans: adj. 互补的；补充的，补足的【记忆】词根记忆：complement（补充物）+ary（…的）→互补的

sentences.english: The computer and the human mind have different but complementary abilities.
sentences.chinese: 电脑与人脑各不相同，却又互为补充。

detailed_translations.english: complementary things go well together, although they are usually different

name: congruent
trans: adj. 全等的

sentences.english: They want to work in an organization whose values are congruent with their own.
sentences.chinese: 他们想在一家与他们自己的价值观相同的组织里工作。

detailed_translations.english: congruent  triangles  are the same size and shape

name: coordinate
trans: n. 坐标（用复数）

sentences.english: Matching bag and accessories provide a complete ensemble of colour coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 颜色协调的包和饰品使全套服装的颜色搭配齐全了。

detailed_translations.english: one of a set of numbers which give the exact position of a point on a map, computer screen etc
equal in importance or rank in a sentence
to organize an activity so that the people involved in it work well together and achieve a good result

name: cube
trans: n. 立方形；立方【同根】cubic adj. 立方体的

sentences.english: a sugar cube
sentences.chinese: 一块方糖

sentences.english: an ice cube
sentences.chinese: 一小方块冰

sentences.english: Cut the meat into small cubes.
sentences.chinese: 把肉切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: a solid object with six equal square sides

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成立方形；使自乘二次；量…的体积
detailed_translations.english: to multiply a number by itself twice

name: decimal
trans: adj. 十进制的；n. 小数

sentences.english: changing to a decimal system
sentences.chinese: 改为十进制

sentences.english: calculations accurate to three decimal places
sentences.chinese: 精确到小数点后三位的计算

detailed_translations.english: a decimal system is based on the number 10
a  fraction (= a number less than 1 )  that is shown as a  full stop  followed by the number of  tenth s  ,  hundredth s  etc. The numbers 0.5, 0.175, and 0.661 are decimals.

name: denominator
trans: n. 分母

sentences.english: You have to enter numerator and denominator.
sentences.chinese: 您需要输入结果的分子和分母。

sentences.english: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result!
sentences.chinese: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数！

sentences.english: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering a numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result.
sentences.chinese: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数。

detailed_translations.english: the number below the line in a  fraction

name: derivative
trans: n. 导数

sentences.english: the derivatives market
sentences.chinese: 金融衍生品市场

detailed_translations.chinese: [化学] 衍生物，派生物；导数
detailed_translations.english: something that has developed or been produced from something else

name: deviation
trans: n. 离差【记忆】词根记忆：de（离开）+vi（道路）+ ation→偏离道路→离差

sentences.english: deviation from the normal procedure
sentences.chinese: 背离正常的程序

sentences.english: a compass deviation of 5˚ (= from true north)
sentences.chinese: 罗盘偏差5度（相对正北而言）

detailed_translations.english: a noticeable difference from what is expected or acceptable

name: divide
trans: v. 分开；除；使产生分歧【搭配】divide into 分成divide sth. from sth. 把某物和某物分开

sentences.english: The book is divided into six sections.
sentences.chinese: 本书分为六部分。

sentences.english: The money will be divided equally among the charities.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将被平分给各慈善机构。

detailed_translations.english: if something divides, or if you divide it, it separates into two or more parts

name: enumerate
trans: vt. 枚举；计数【记忆】词根记忆：e（加强）+numer（数，计数）+ ate→用数表示→计数

sentences.english: I enumerate the work that will have to be done.
sentences.chinese: 我将必须要做的工作一一列举出来。

detailed_translations.english: to name a list of things one by one

name: error
trans: n. 错误【搭配】error message 错误信息

sentences.english: There must be an error in our calculations.
sentences.chinese: 我们的计算肯定有错。

detailed_translations.english: a mistake

name: even
trans: adj. 偶数的【反义】odd adj. 奇数的

sentences.english: Most companies have suffered a drop in their profits, even very large companies.
sentences.chinese: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.english: It was quite difficult to see, even with the light on.
sentences.chinese: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.english: He became quite successful and even appeared on a television show once.
sentences.chinese: 他相当成功，甚至还上了一次电视节目。

sentences.english: She did not even bother to phone us.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。

sentences.english: He never even acknowledged my letter.
sentences.chinese: 他收到我的信甚至从不会告知一声。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize something that is unexpected or surprising in what you are saying

name: exponent
trans: n. 指数

sentences.english: The fatigue life increases with decreasing modulus of surface layer in a power function with a negative exponent.
sentences.chinese: 沥青面层的疲劳寿命随着面层材料模量的降低以负指数的幂函数形式增加；

sentences.english: In addition, this paper also suggests that the reason for high burning rate-pressure exponent is deflagration of some components in propellant.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本文还提出，火药中某些组分的爆燃是导致一些火药燃速压力指数较高的原因。

sentences.english: Examining the influence of the sports factors on the step exponent of colleges students with the experiment method, questionnaire survey method and Mathematical Statistics method.
sentences.chinese: 采用实验法、问卷调查法和数理统计法，观察运动因素对大学生台阶指数的影响。

detailed_translations.english: a sign written above and to the right of a number or letter to show how many times that quantity is to be multiplied by itself

name: formula
trans: n. 公式；配方【搭配】mathematical formula 数学公式

sentences.english: We’re still searching for a peace formula.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍在寻找和平方案。

sentences.english: There is no magic formula (= a method that is certain to be successful ) that will transform sorrow into happiness.
sentences.chinese: 没有妙方可以化悲为喜。

sentences.english: With viewing figures up a million, the programme has a winning formula .
sentences.chinese: 收视人数增加了一百万，这个节目的确拥有吸引观众的法宝。

sentences.english: the formula for calculating distance
sentences.chinese: 计算距离的公式

detailed_translations.english: a series of numbers or letters that represent a mathematical or scientific rule

name: hyperbola
trans: n. 双曲线

sentences.english: I should be looking only on the hyperbola.
sentences.chinese: 我应该只看双曲线上的点就足够了。

sentences.english: Yes, we can still find points on the hyperbola and so on.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍然可以在双曲线上找到解。

sentences.english: If you look at this point where the hyperbola and the circle touch each other, first of all, I don't know which circle I am going to look at.
sentences.chinese: 来看一下这一点,这里双曲线和圆刚好接触的地方，首先，我不知道我要看的是圆上面的哪一点。

detailed_translations.english: a conic section formed by a plane that cuts both bases of a cone; it consists of two branches asymptotic to two intersecting fixed lines and has two foci

name: infinity
trans: n. 无限，无穷大【记忆】词根记忆：in（无）+fin（范围）+ity→无限

sentences.english: In the equation below, as E goes to zero, n approaches infinity.
sentences.chinese: 在下面的方程式中，E趋向于零时，n接近无穷大。

detailed_translations.english: a number that is too large to be calculated

name: intersect
trans: v. 相交【同根】intersection n. 交点；道路交叉口

sentences.english: Streets usually intersect at right angles.
sentences.chinese: 街道通常成直角相交。

sentences.english: So tell me about. You have done music, where do these things intersect for you?
sentences.chinese: 那么，你已经做过音乐和，艺术，这些事情的交叉点在哪里呢？

sentences.english: BP is also working on a "relief well" to intersect the original well, but this is experimental and could take two to three months to stop the flow.
sentences.chinese: 英国石油公司正努力使这座减压救险井与原先的那一座相交。 这还在实验阶段，而且可能要花上几个月的时间来停止这次的漏油事件。

detailed_translations.english: if two lines or roads intersect, they meet or go across each other

name: invariance
trans: n. 不变性，恒定性【记忆】词根记忆：in（不）+vari（变化）+ance（表性质）→不变性

name: logarithm
trans: n. 对数

sentences.english: This led him to calculate that the information content of any event was proportional to the logarithm of its inverse probability of occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 这使他提出了这样的推论：事件的信息容量与事件发生逆概率的对数成正比。

sentences.english: This plots the logarithm to base 10 of the values on the axis.
sentences.chinese: 此命令在轴上绘制以 10 为底的值的对数。

sentences.english: A logarithm tells you what power a base number must be raised to in order to produce a given value.
sentences.chinese: 对数说明一个底数的几次幂等于一个给定的值。

detailed_translations.english: a number representing another number in a mathematical system so that complicated calculations can be done as simple addition

name: maximize
trans: v. 使最大化；充分利用【记忆】词根记忆：maxim（大，高）+ize（…化） →使最大化

sentences.english: We need to maximize the space.
sentences.chinese: 我们要充分利用空间。

detailed_translations.english: to  click  on a special part on a window on a computer screen so that it becomes as big as the screen

name: multiply
trans: v. （使）增加；乘

sentences.english: Children will learn to multiply in the second grade.
sentences.chinese: 儿童在二年级学习乘法。

detailed_translations.chinese: 乘；使增加；使繁殖；使相乘
detailed_translations.english: to do a calculation in which you add a number to itself a particular number of times

name: numerator
trans: n. 分子

sentences.english: You have to enter numerator and denominator.
sentences.chinese: 您需要输入结果的分子和分母。

sentences.english: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result!
sentences.chinese: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数！

sentences.english: In this exercise you have to convert a given number into a fraction by entering a numerator and denominator. Do not forget to reduce the result.
sentences.chinese: 在此练习中您要将一个给定的数字转换成一个分数，输入转化结果的分子和分母。不要忘了将结果约分至最简分数。

detailed_translations.english: the number above the line in a fraction, for example 5 is the numerator in 5/6

name: pentagon
trans: n. 五边形，五角形【记忆】词根记忆：penta（五）+gon（角）→五角形

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with five sides and five angles

name: percentage
trans: n. 百分率，百分比【记忆】词根记忆：percent（百分比）+age（表状态） →百分比，百分率

sentences.english: Interest rates fell by six percentage points (= 6% ) .
sentences.chinese: 利息下降了6个百分点。

sentences.english: The numbers are small in percentage terms (= when calculated as a percentage ) .
sentences.chinese: 按百分比来看，这些数字很小。

detailed_translations.english: an amount expressed as if it is part of a total which is 100

name: permutation
trans: n. 排列

sentences.english: a sandwich shop that sells every possible permutation of meat and bread
sentences.chinese: 出售各种肉类和面包组合的三明治店

detailed_translations.english: one of the different ways in which a number of things can be arranged

name: power
trans: n. 乘方；幂

sentences.english: It is not within my power (= I am unable or not in a position) to help you.
sentences.chinese: 我是爱莫能助啊。

sentences.english: The ship was helpless against the power of the storm.
sentences.chinese: 那艘船只能任凭强大的暴风雨肆虐。

sentences.english: The Secretary of State has the power to approve the proposals.
sentences.chinese: 国务卿有权批准这些提议。

sentences.english: 4 to the power of 3 is 4^3 (= 4 × 4 × 4 = 64).
sentences.chinese: 4的3次方是4^3。

detailed_translations.english: the ability or right to control people or events

name: progression
trans: n. 级数；前进

name: quadrant
trans: n. 象限【记忆】词根记忆：quadr（四）+ant→由四个部分组成→象限

sentences.english: A symbol appears in an upper quadrant of the screen.
sentences.chinese: 一个符号出现在屏幕上方的一个象限里。

sentences.english: A virgin material can be "started" from 0 into either the first or the third quadrant .
sentences.chinese: 一个没有用过的材料可以从0点“开始”进入第一或第三象限。

sentences.english: A virgin material can be "started" from point 0 into either the first or the third quadrant .
sentences.chinese: 一个没有用过的材料可以从0点「开始」进入第一或第三象限。

detailed_translations.english: an instrument for measuring angles, used when sailing or looking at the stars

name: quotient
trans: n. 商

sentences.english: Which number is the quotient in the equation?
sentences.chinese: 在这个等式中，哪个数是商？

sentences.english: The paper discusses the relation of entropy change and quotient of heat-temperature based on the second law of thermodynamics.
sentences.chinese: 通过热力学第二定律，从理论上分析熵变与热温商之间的关系，再进一步由实践验证。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the calculus of residues of quotient function at ist pole, then obtains some computational formulas by the use of determinant.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了商函数在其极点处的残数计算，得到几个用行列式表示的计算公式，并介绍了它们的应用。

detailed_translations.english: the number which is obtained when one number is divided by another

name: sequence
trans: n. 序列；连续【记忆】词根记忆：sequ（跟随）+ence（状态）→一个跟一个→连续

sentences.english: Be careful to perform the actions in the correct sequence.
sentences.chinese: 注意要按正确的顺序来完成动作。

detailed_translations.english: the order that something happens or exists in, or the order it is supposed to happen or exist in

name: slope
trans: n. 斜率

sentences.english: a steep slope
sentences.chinese: 陡坡

sentences.english: a gentle
sentences.chinese: 缓坡

sentences.english: She looked back up the grassy slope.
sentences.chinese: 她回头望了一眼那绿草如茵的坡地。

sentences.english: a pleasant garden that slopes down to the river
sentences.chinese: 一座向河边倾斜的宜人花园

detailed_translations.english: a piece of ground or a surface that slopes
if the ground or a surface slopes, it is higher at one end than the other

name: statistics
trans: n. 统计资料，统计学【搭配】reliable statistics 可靠的统计数字

sentences.english: crime/unemployment, etc. statistics
sentences.chinese: 犯罪、失业等统计资料

sentences.english: According to official statistics the disease killed over 500 people.
sentences.chinese: 根据官方的统计数字，500多人死于这种疾病。

detailed_translations.english: a collection of information shown in numbers

name: summation
trans: n. 总和【记忆】词根记忆：summ（加）+ation（行为）→总和

sentences.english: Her introduction is a model of fairness, a lively summation of Irish history.
sentences.chinese: 她的导论是公正的典范，是对爱尔兰历史的总结。

detailed_translations.chinese: 总结， 概要； 总数， 合计
detailed_translations.english: a  summary  or  summing-up

name: addition
trans: n. 加，增加（物）【记忆】词根记忆：add（加）+ition（表名词）→加，增加

sentences.english: This is a fine book; a worthy addition to the series.
sentences.chinese: 这是一本好书——是对这套丛书有价值的增补。

detailed_translations.chinese: 加， 加法； 附加物
detailed_translations.english: something that is added to something else, often in order to improve it

name: classification
trans: n. 分类；级别【记忆】来自classify（v. 把…分类）

sentences.english: the classification of wines according to quality
sentences.chinese: 葡萄酒按品质的分类

sentences.english: There are five job classifications.
sentences.chinese: 有五种工作类别。

detailed_translations.english: a process in which you put something into the group or class it belongs to

name: combination
trans: n. 组合；结合；结合体【记忆】来自combine（v. 结合）

sentences.english: a combination nightclub and café
sentences.chinese: 夜总会兼咖啡馆

detailed_translations.english: two or more different things that exist together or are used or put together

name: dimension
trans: n. （长、宽、厚、深）度；维；面积【同根】dimensional adj. 空间的

sentences.english: You can have a spiritual dimension to your life without being religious.
sentences.chinese: 即使你不信宗教，也可以在生命中拥有精神层面的内容。

detailed_translations.chinese: 方面;[数] 维；尺寸；次元；容积 vt标出尺寸
detailed_translations.english: a part of a situation or a quality involved in it

name: fraction
trans: n. 分数；小部分【记忆】词根记忆：frac（碎裂）+tion→碎的部分→小部分

sentences.english: I got these shoes at a fraction of the original price.
sentences.chinese: 我以原价的一个零头买到了这双鞋子。

detailed_translations.english: a very small amount of something

name: function
trans: n. 函数

sentences.english: Her legs have now ceased to function .
sentences.chinese: 她的双腿现在已经丧失正常功能了。

sentences.english: You know I can’t function (= cannot perform normal activities ) without a coffee in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 你知道的，我早上不喝杯咖啡就无法工作。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作， 运行； 起作用
detailed_translations.english: to work in the correct or intended way

detailed_translations.chinese: 功能，职务；【数】函数；重大聚会
detailed_translations.english: the purpose that something has, or the job that someone or something does

name: equation
trans: n. 方程（式）；等同【搭配】identical equation 恒等式

sentences.english: When children enter the equation , further tensions may arise within a marriage.
sentences.chinese: 有了孩子以后，婚姻中可能出现新的矛盾。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or situation in which several things must be considered and dealt with

name: circumference
trans: n. 圆周【记忆】词根记忆：circum（环绕）+fer（带来）+ ence（表状态）→来环绕一圈→圆周

sentences.english: ...a scientist calculating the Earth's circumference.
sentences.chinese: …一位正在计算地球周长的科学家。

detailed_translations.english: the distance or measurement around the outside of a circle or any round shape

name: cone
trans: n. 圆锥

sentences.english: ...orange traffic cones.
sentences.chinese: …橙色的交通锥形警示标。

detailed_translations.chinese: 圆锥体，圆锥形；[植] 球果
detailed_translations.english: a solid or hollow shape that is round at one end, has sloping sides, and has a point at the other end, or something with this shape

name: cylinder
trans: n. 圆柱体【记忆】词根记忆：cylind（卷）+er→卷成卷→圆柱体

sentences.english: The gases are stored in cylinders.
sentences.chinese: 气体储存在圆筒内。

sentences.english: a four-cylinder engine
sentences.chinese: 四汽缸引擎

detailed_translations.english: a shape, object, or container with circular ends and long straight sides

name: diameter
trans: n. 直径【记忆】词根记忆：dia（穿过）+meter（测量）→穿过圆心测量→直径

sentences.english: Draw a circle six centimetres in diameter.
sentences.chinese: 画一个直径为六厘米的圆。

detailed_translations.english: a straight line from one side of a circle to the other side, passing through the centre of the circle, or the length of this line

name: ellipse
trans: n. 椭圆，椭圆形【记忆】词根记忆：el（=e出）+lips（离开）+e →（圆的边）偏离圆心→椭圆

sentences.english: The Earth orbits in an ellipse.
sentences.chinese: 地球沿椭圆形轨道运动。

detailed_translations.english: a curved shape like a circle, but with two slightly longer and flatter sides

name: geometry
trans: n. 几何学【同根】geometric adj. 几何的，几何学的

sentences.english: the very ordered way in which mathematics and geometry describe nature
sentences.chinese: 数学和几何学描述自然的条理性

detailed_translations.english: the study in  mathematics  of the angles and shapes formed by the relationships of lines, surfaces, and solid objects in space

name: perimeter
trans: n. 周长，周界【记忆】词根记忆：peri（周围）+meter（测量）→周长

sentences.english: ...the perimeter of the airport.
sentences.chinese: …机场周边。

detailed_translations.chinese: 周长；周界；[眼科] 视野计
detailed_translations.english: the whole length of the border around an area or shape

name: polygon
trans: n. 多边形【记忆】词根记忆：poly（多）+gon（角）→多边形

sentences.english: The color is used for the area covered by a (multi-)polygon or the line of a (multi-)linestring.
sentences.chinese: 颜色用于显示一个（多）多边形所覆盖的区域或一个（多）行字符串的行。

sentences.english: If the horizontal line drawn is aligned with a polygon vertex, then only the segments that are below the line are counted.
sentences.chinese: 如果所绘制的水平线与一个多边形顶点对齐，那么只会计算位于该线下方的部分。

sentences.english: Although the bounding box is a polygon defining the area represented for the user, I simplify and use one point of this data.
sentences.chinese: 尽管这个边界框是一个用于定义表示用户的区域的多边形，但我简化并使用这些数据的一个点。

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with three or more sides

name: radius
trans: n. 半径【记忆】词根记忆：radi（光线）+us→半径就像是从一点发出N多光线，它们距离都相等→半径

sentences.english: The shock of the explosion was felt over a radius of forty miles.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸引起的剧烈震动在方圆40英里内都能感觉得到。

detailed_translations.english: an area that covers a particular distance in all directions from a central point

name: rectangle
trans: n. 长方形，矩形【记忆】词根记忆：rect（直）+angle（角）→每个角均为直角的多边形→长方形

sentences.english: Suppose the width of a rectangle is x metres.
sentences.chinese: 设长方形的宽是 x 米。

detailed_translations.english: a shape that has four straight sides, two of which are usually longer than the other two, and four 90˚ angles at the corners

name: square
trans: n. 正方形；平方

sentences.english: First of all, draw a square.
sentences.chinese: 首先，画一个正方形。

sentences.english: She lives in Hanover Square.
sentences.chinese: 她住在汉诺威广场。

detailed_translations.english: a shape with four straight equal sides with 90˚ angles at the corners

name: symmetry
trans: n. 对称（性）；匀称【反义】asymmetry n. 不对称

sentences.english: the symmetry of the design
sentences.chinese: 图案的对称性

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being symmetrical

name: triangle
trans: n. 三角（形）【记忆】词根记忆：tri（三）+angle（角）→三角

sentences.english: Yes, it is like a triangle.
sentences.chinese: 是的，它象一个三角形。

sentences.english: So, we have to find the area of the triangle.
sentences.chinese: 因此我们必须求出三角形的面积。

sentences.english: It can measure not only the sine wave, square wave, triangle wave, a sharp pulse but also can measure other characteristics of the signal wave.
sentences.chinese: 它不仅可以测量正弦波、方波、三角波、尖脉冲信号和其他具有周期特性的信号的频率，而且还可以测量它们的周期。

detailed_translations.english: a flat shape with three straight sides and three angles

name: negotiate
trans: v. 洽谈，协商；顺利通过

sentences.english: His first aim is to get the warring parties back to the negotiating table (= discussing something ).
sentences.chinese: 他的首要目标就是把交战各方拉回到谈判桌上。

detailed_translations.english: to discuss something in order to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics

name: range
trans: n. 范围，界限；成套产品；射程；（山）脉；v. 排列；包括；涉及【记忆】本身为词根，意为：排列，顺序【搭配】range between 范围在…与…之间不等a wide range of 范围广的，多方面的，一大片a range of 一排，一行，一系列range from 延伸；（在一定程度或范围内）变动，变化【同根】ranger n. 护林员

sentences.english: a temperature range of 72-85˚
sentences.chinese: 72 度到85度之间的温度范围

sentences.english: Even the cheapest property was out of our price range (= too expensive for us ) .
sentences.chinese: 即使是最便宜的房子也超出了我们能承受的价格范围。

sentences.english: There were 120 students whose ages ranged from 10 to 18.
sentences.chinese: 有120名学生，年龄在10至18岁之间。

detailed_translations.english: the limits within which amounts, quantities, ages etc vary
if prices, levels, temperatures etc range from one amount to another, they include both those amounts and anything in between

name: benefit
trans: n. 益处，好处；恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴；v. 有益于，得益【记忆】词根记忆：bene（善，好）+fit→利益，好处【搭配】benefit from/by 从…得益，受益，得到好处material benefit 物质利益for the benefit of 为了…的利益（好处）social benefits 社会效益【同义】advantage n. 好处【同根】beneficial adj. 有益的

sentences.english: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

detailed_translations.english: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

detailed_translations.chinese: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
detailed_translations.english: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money

name: discounted
trans: adj. 折扣的

name: private
trans: adj. 私人的；私下的；私立的【记忆】词根记忆：priv（私有的）+ate（具有…的） →私人的【同义】secret adj. 秘密的；机密的personal adj. 个人的

sentences.english: Morris has a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

sentences.english: He made some notes for his private use.
sentences.chinese: 他记了些笔记供自己所用。

sentences.english: They objected to any form of private property .
sentences.chinese: 他们反对任何形式的私有财产。

detailed_translations.english: for use by one person or group, not for everyone

name: healthcare
trans: n. 医疗保健，健康护理【搭配】healthcare system 医疗保健体系

sentences.english: The products are usually used in healthcare area and pharmaceutical area.
sentences.chinese: 产品通常用于在医疗保健领域和医药领域。

sentences.english: Why, with such a great healthcare system that promises the best care to everyone, would a person ever need to consult a search engine for an alternative?
sentences.chinese: 这样一个伟大的医疗保健系统许诺给每个人提供最好的照料，为什么还会有人求助于搜索引擎来寻找替代品？

sentences.english: They are the backbone of rural communities, and in many households they have the key responsibility for food security, education opportunities and healthcare.
sentences.chinese: 她们是农村社区的支柱，而且在许多家庭，她们负有粮食安全、教育机会和医疗保健的主要责任。

name: purchase
trans: v. 买，购买；n. 购买的物品【记忆】联想记忆：pur+chase（追逐）→为了得到紧俏的商品而竞相追逐→购买【搭配】purchase from... 从…处购买【同义】buy v. 买【同根】purchaser n. 购买者

sentences.english: She paid for her purchases and left.
sentences.chinese: 她付钱买好东西离开了。

sentences.english: I enclose my receipt as proof of purchase .
sentences.chinese: 我附上小票作为购物凭证。

sentences.english: She made two purchases from my stall.
sentences.chinese: 她从我的货摊上买了两样东西。

sentences.english: You can purchase insurance online.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在网上买保险。

detailed_translations.english: something you buy, or the act of buying it
to buy something

name: scheme
trans: n. 计划，方案；阴谋；安排；配置；v. 计划，密谋，策划；阴谋【记忆】联想记忆：教学大纲（schema）是学习的计划（scheme）

sentences.english: The money will be used for teacher training schemes.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将用于教师培训计划。

sentences.english: a pension scheme
sentences.chinese: 退休金计划

sentences.english: a get-rich-quick scheme
sentences.chinese: 快速致富的手段

detailed_translations.english: an official plan that is intended to help people in some way, for example by providing education or training

name: along with
trans: 和…一起，随着；以及；连同

name: one-off
trans: adj. 一次性的；非经常的

name: amusement
trans: n. 消遣，娱乐；乐趣【记忆】词根记忆：amuse（使愉快）+ment（表名词）→娱乐

sentences.english: Steve couldn’t hide his amusement.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫忍俊不禁。

sentences.english: The cats are a constant source of amusement to us.
sentences.chinese: 那些猫给我们带来无穷的乐趣。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when you think something is funny

name: coordinate
trans: v. 协调，调节；配合【搭配】coordinate...with... 使…协调

sentences.english: Matching bag and accessories provide a complete ensemble of colour coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 颜色协调的包和饰品使全套服装的颜色搭配齐全了。

detailed_translations.english: one of a set of numbers which give the exact position of a point on a map, computer screen etc
equal in importance or rank in a sentence
to organize an activity so that the people involved in it work well together and achieve a good result

name: coordination
trans: n. 协调【搭配】in coordination with... 与…协调

sentences.english: Too much alcohol affects your coordination.
sentences.chinese: 喝酒太多会影响你动作的协调。

detailed_translations.english: the way in which your muscles move together when you perform a movement

name: coordinator
trans: n. 协调者

sentences.english: But then, zero hour arrives. The AWACS plane becomes the coordinator of the raids.
sentences.chinese: 时钟跳过零点，AWACS飞机立刻成为了空袭的协调中心。

sentences.english: RM Inventory management: Cooperate with supply coordinator for the warehouse management.
sentences.chinese: 原料仓库管理：配合供应协调员做原料仓库管理。

sentences.english: Subsequent requests are treated similarly: the clients always contact the central coordinator node, and the coordinator node retrieves the data from the correct node.
sentences.chinese: 后续请求也被同等对待：客户端总是联系中心协调者节点，而协调者节点会从正确的节点检索数据。

detailed_translations.english: someone who organizes the way people work together in a particular activity

name: consult
trans: vt. 请教；查阅；商议【记忆】联想记忆：不顾侮辱（insult），不耻请教（consult）【同根】consultation n. 请教；咨询

sentences.english: If symptoms persist, consult a doctor without delay.
sentences.chinese: 如果症状持续的话，马上咨询医生。

sentences.english: Have you consulted a dictionary?
sentences.chinese: 你查过词典了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to ask for information or advice from someone because it is their job to know something

name: convention
trans: n. 大会，会议；惯例，常规，习俗；公约，协定【记忆】词根记忆：con（共同）+vent（来）+ ion→大家共同来遵守的东西→习俗【同义】meeting n. 会议conference n. 会议

sentences.english: a teachers’ convention
sentences.chinese: 教师大会

sentences.english: the city’s new convention center
sentences.chinese: 该市新建的会议中心

sentences.english: a convention for science fiction fans
sentences.chinese: 科幻小说迷的集会

detailed_translations.english: a large formal meeting for people who belong to the same profession or organization or who have the same interests

name: intercede
trans: v. 调解；求情【记忆】词根记忆：inter（在…之间）+ced（行走）+e→在两者中间走→调解

sentences.english: They asked my father to intercede with the king on their behalf.
sentences.chinese: 他们请我父亲代他们向国王求情。

detailed_translations.english: to speak in support of someone, especially in order to try to prevent them from being punished

name: negotiable
trans: adj. 可通过谈判解决的；可协商的

sentences.english: Part-time barman required. Hours and salary negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 招聘兼职酒吧男服务员，工作时间及薪金面议。

sentences.english: The price is not negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 价格没有商量的余地。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可通过谈判解决的；可协商的
detailed_translations.english: an offer, price, contract etc that is negotiable can be discussed and changed before being agreed on

name: pact
trans: n. 协定，条约

sentences.english: the Warsaw pact
sentences.chinese: 华沙条约

detailed_translations.english: a formal agreement between two groups, countries, or people, especially to help each other or to stop fighting

name: reconcile
trans: v. （与某人）和解，和好【记忆】词根记忆：re（再）+con+cil（召集）+ e→ （双方）再次召到一起→和解

sentences.english: The possibility remains that the two theories may be reconciled.
sentences.chinese: 这两种理论仍是有可能协调的。

sentences.english: The pair were reconciled after Jackson made a public apology.
sentences.chinese: 杰克逊公开道歉之后，这两个人又言归于好了。

detailed_translations.english: if you reconcile two ideas, situations, or facts, you find a way in which they can both be true or acceptable

name: reconciliation
trans: n. 调解，协调；和解

sentences.english: Her ex-husband had always hoped for a reconciliation.
sentences.chinese: 她的前夫一直想和她重归于好。

sentences.english: The treaty has brought a new spirit of reconciliation on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 条约使双方产生了新的和解精神。

sentences.english: The leadership announced a programme of national reconciliation (= an attempt by all sides to end a war or trouble in a country ) .
sentences.chinese: 领导层宣布了一个国内各方和解方案。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which two people, countries etc become friendly with each other again after quarrelling

name: treaty
trans: n. 条约，协议；谈判【记忆】词根记忆：treat（处理）+y→处理（纷争的文件）→条约

sentences.english: Both sides have agreed to sign the treaty .
sentences.chinese: 双方都同意签署该条约。

sentences.english: The peace treaty ends nearly four years of violence.
sentences.chinese: 该和平条约结束了将近四年的暴力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 条约， 协议， 协定
detailed_translations.english: a formal written agreement between two or more countries or governments

name: unanimity
trans: n. 一致同意

sentences.english: All decisions would require unanimity.
sentences.chinese: 所有决定都需要全体一致同意。

detailed_translations.english: a state or situation of complete agreement among a group of people

name: amuse
trans: v. 娱乐；消遣；使发笑

sentences.english: He made funny faces to amuse the children.
sentences.chinese: 他做鬼脸逗孩子们开心。

sentences.english: The kids amused themselves playing hide-and-seek.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们玩捉迷藏玩。

sentences.english: Doing jigsaws would amuse Amy for hours on end.
sentences.chinese: 拼图能让埃米连续玩上几个小时。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone laugh or smile

name: distraction
trans: n. 注意力分散，分心；分心的事物；娱乐，放松

sentences.english: I study in the library as there are too many distractions at home.
sentences.chinese: 我在图书馆学习，家里分心的事太多。

detailed_translations.english: something that stops you paying attention to what you are doing

name: entertain
trans: v. 招待，款待；使娱乐；使欢乐【记忆】词根记忆：enter（进入）+tain（拿住）→在（工作）中间抓住时间（休息）→使娱乐【搭配】entertain sb. with... 用…娱乐/款待某人

sentences.english: A museum should aim to entertain as well as educate.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆应该致力于成为娱乐和教育功能并重的场所。

sentences.english: Mark usually does the cooking when we entertain.
sentences.chinese: 我们招待客人时通常都是马克下厨。

sentences.english: Do you get an allowance for entertaining clients?
sentences.chinese: 你招待客户有补助吗？

detailed_translations.english: to amuse or interest people in a way that gives them pleasure

name: leisure
trans: n. 空闲时间，悠闲【搭配】leisure wear 便装at leisure 清闲

sentences.english: Most people now enjoy shorter working hours and more leisure time.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都喜欢工作时间短些，闲暇时间多些。

sentences.english: Watching television is now the nation’s most popular leisure activity.
sentences.chinese: 看电视是当前国民最普遍的消遣活动。

sentences.english: The hotel offers various leisure facilities such as a swimming pool and sauna.
sentences.chinese: 酒店提供游泳池、桑拿浴室等各种休闲设施。

sentences.english: The leisure industry (= the business of providing leisure activities ) is now an important part of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 现在休闲娱乐行业是经济的一个重要组成部分。

detailed_translations.english: time when you are not working or studying and can relax and do things you enjoy

name: leisured
trans: adj. 有空闲的

name: pastime
trans: n. 娱乐，消遣

sentences.english: Reading was her favourite pastime.
sentences.chinese: 阅读是她最喜爱的消遣方式。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do because you think it is enjoyable or interesting

name: recess
trans: n./v. 休假；休息【搭配】at recess 在休息时间

sentences.english: the deep recesses of the cave
sentences.chinese: 洞穴的幽深处

detailed_translations.english: a space in the wall of a room, especially for shelves, cupboards etc

name: recreate
trans: v. （使）得到休养，（使）得到娱乐【记忆】词根记忆：re（一再）+cre（做）+ate（使…）→一再做（放松活动）→（使）得到娱乐

sentences.english: You can never recreate the feeling of winning for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 你永远无法再次体会第一次获胜时的心情。

name: recreation
trans: n. 娱乐，消遣【搭配】recreation area 娱乐休闲区

sentences.english: His only recreations are drinking beer and watching football.
sentences.chinese: 他唯一的消遣就是喝啤酒和看足球比赛。

sentences.english: the provision of recreation facilities
sentences.chinese: 提供娱乐设施

detailed_translations.english: an activity that you do for pleasure or amusement

name: recreational
trans: adj. 娱乐的，消遣的；休养的

sentences.english: ...parks and other recreational facilities.
sentences.chinese: …公园及其它娱乐设施。

detailed_translations.english: Recreational means relating to things people do in their spare time to relax

name: relaxation
trans: n. 放松；缓和；消遣

sentences.english: I play the piano for relaxation.
sentences.chinese: 我弹钢琴自娱。

sentences.english: Meditation allows you to enter a state of deep relaxation .
sentences.chinese: 冥想能使你进入完全放松的状态。

detailed_translations.english: a way of resting and enjoying yourself

name: repose
trans: n. 休息；休憩；闲适【记忆】词根记忆：re（一再）+pos（放）+e→一再放下（工作）→休息

sentences.english: The delightful sofa invites repose.
sentences.chinese: 这么舒适的沙发不由得让人想躺下休息。

sentences.english: Near the Azores, just below the sunlit Atlantic surface, sperm whales float in vertical repose.
sentences.chinese: 在亚速尔群岛附近，大西洋表面太阳照射不到的地方，抹香鲸垂直着身体休息。

detailed_translations.english: if something reposes somewhere, it has been put there

name: slacken
trans: v. （使）松弛，放松；放慢

sentences.english: The heavy rain showed no signs of slackening off.
sentences.chinese: 大雨没有减弱的迹象。

detailed_translations.chinese: 松劲，懈怠；变松弛；变缓慢
detailed_translations.english: to gradually become slower, weaker, less active etc, or to make something do this

name: vacation
trans: v. 休假；度假；n. 假期【搭配】vacation tour 度假旅游on vacation 在度假中

sentences.english: What will you do this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 你这个假期将干什么？

sentences.english: Do you have any vacation plans?
sentences.chinese: 您假期有什么安排吗？

sentences.english: Do you have any idea for this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 这个假期你有什么想法吗？

detailed_translations.english: to go somewhere for a holiday
a holiday, or time spent not working

name: entitlement
trans: n. 权利；津贴

sentences.english: They lose their entitlement to welfare when they start work.
sentences.chinese: 他们开始工作时就丧失了享受福利的权利。

detailed_translations.english: the official right to have or do something, or the amount that you have a right to receive

name: subsidise
trans: v. 资助，津贴

sentences.english: Now the questions are: why should northern European taxpayers be required to subsidise Greek voters given their failure to control their own government?
sentences.chinese: 现在的问题是：希腊的选民未能看管好自己的政府，为什么要北欧国家的纳税人去资助他们？

name: welfare
trans: n. 福利；安宁，幸福【搭配】welfare work 福利事业welfare benefits 福利待遇

sentences.english: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.
sentences.chinese: 我们唯一关心的是孩子们的幸福。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s welfare is their health and happiness

name: well-being
trans: n. 安宁，福利【记忆】合成词：well（好，健康）+being（存在）→安宁，福利

sentences.english: Singing can create a sense of well-being.
sentences.chinese: 唱歌能产生一种幸福感。

detailed_translations.chinese: 健康， 幸福； 福利
detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being comfortable, healthy, and happy

name: enthusiast
trans: n. 热衷于…的人；热心者；爱好者

detailed_translations.english: someone who is very interested in a particular activity or subject

name: flight
trans: n. 飞行，飞翔

sentences.english: He immediately booked a flight to Toulouse.
sentences.chinese: 他当即就订了去图卢兹的航班。

sentences.english: In 1968, the first supersonic airliner took flight (= began flying ) .
sentences.chinese: 1968年，首架超音速客机飞上天空。

sentences.english: When the alarm sounded, the whole gang took flight.
sentences.chinese: 警报响起，一帮人全逃跑了。

detailed_translations.english: a journey in a plane or space vehicle, or the plane or vehicle that is making the journey

name: fantasy
trans: n. 幻想；想象

sentences.english: I used to have fantasies about living in Paris with an artist.
sentences.chinese: 我过去常幻想着在巴黎与一位艺术家同住。

sentences.english: sexual fantasies
sentences.chinese: 性幻想

sentences.english: Young children sometimes can’t distinguish between fantasy and reality.
sentences.chinese: 小孩子有时不能区分幻想与现实。

sentences.english: He lived in a fantasy world of his own, even as a small boy.
sentences.chinese: 甚至还是个小孩子的时候，他就生活在一个幻想世界里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 想象， 幻想； 想象的产物
detailed_translations.english: an exciting and unusual experience or situation you imagine happening to you, but which will probably never happen

name: jet
trans: n. 喷气式飞机

sentences.english: He owns a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 他拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 喷射，喷嘴；喷气式飞机；黑玉
detailed_translations.english: a fast plane with a jet engine
if a liquid or gas jets out from somewhere, it comes quickly out of a small hole

name: pack
trans: v. （把…）打包；塞满；n. 包

sentences.english: I forgot to pack my razor.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记把剃须刀放入行李包了。

sentences.english: Hundreds of people packed into the mosque.
sentences.chinese: 成百上千的人挤进了清真寺。

sentences.english: Send away for your free information pack today.
sentences.chinese: 今天就来函索取免费资料包吧。

detailed_translations.english: to put things into cases, bags etc ready for a trip somewhere
something wrapped in paper or packed in a box and then sent by post or taken somewhere

name: equipment
trans: n. 设备，装备

sentences.english: a shop selling camping equipment
sentences.chinese: 出售露营装备的商店

sentences.english: some brand new computer equipment
sentences.chinese: 一些全新的计算机设备

sentences.english: a very useful piece of equipment
sentences.chinese: 一件非常有用的设备

sentences.english: A lot of money was spent on the equipment of the new hospital.
sentences.chinese: 新医院的装备花费巨大。
